means: 溜冰鞋( skate的名词复数 )
溜冰，滑冰( skate的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: A boy of about ten came up on roller-skates.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个10岁左右、脚蹬旱冰鞋的男孩滑了过来。

sentence.Network_en: Just then, Bart returned, wobbling on his skates.
sentence.Network_cn: 就在这时，巴特摇摇晃晃地滑着轮滑回来了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: skaret 明礁skates 滑架skaw 岬
轮滑鞋(skates)通常分为四轮滚轴(quad roller skates)和直排轮滑(inline skates/blades)两种。轮滑运动在今年的广州亚运会上将首次成.
Where can I rent skates in Shanghai ?, 在上海什么地方可以租轮滑鞋子?
She skates poorly ., 她冰滑得不好.

list.abs: 谁帮我翻译音标 - 已回答 - 搜搜问问 ... ring 戒指， skate shoes 滑板鞋， backpack 背包，.
漂移板 (freeline skate) 最先由美国的极限运动者Ryan Farrelly于2004年发明，最初灵感来自于高山滑雪运动，于是漂移板便变成了陆 …
最常用的英文日常用语_爱问知识人 ... Poor thing! 真可怜！ Cheap skate! 小气鬼！ You ask for it! 活该！.
初中英语短语大全 ... 21．a good idea 好主意 22．go skating 去滑冰 23．in the afternoon 在下午.

entry.def: If you skate, you move about wearing ice-skates or roller-skates.

example.ex: I actually skated, and despite some teetering I did not fall on the ice...
example.tran: 我真的滑冰了——尽管有些踉跄，但没有跌跟头。
丹滑着冰来到他的面前。

entry.def: A skate is a kind of flat sea fish.

example.ex: Boats had plenty of mackerel and a few skate.
example.tran: 那些船上有许多鲭鱼，还有几条鳐鱼。

entry.def: If you skate over or round a difficult subject, you avoid discussing it.

example.ex: Scientists have tended to skate over the difficulties of explaining dreams...
example.tran: 科学家们往往回避释梦的难题。

example.ex: When pressed, he skates around the subject of those women who he met as a 19-year-old.
example.tran: 别人逼问他有关他 19 岁时遇到的那些女人的情况时，他就会加以搪塞。
